Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameboard

Class ExpertGameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameboard.GameBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameboard.ExpertGameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExpertModel, HasStrategy<ProfStrategy>, Model, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class ExpertGameBoard extends GameBoard implements ExpertModel
Class ExpertGameBoard offers methods to handle a game with expert rules

  • Field Summary

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, ColorT color, Mage mage)
      Method addPlayer creates and adds a new player. The new player is created considering the fact that the number of pawns such as students and towers in his schoolBoard depends on the number of the players taking part in the game.

    • switchStudents

      public void switchStudents(ColorS hallS, ColorS entranceS) throws PlaceFullException, NoSuchStudentException
      Method switchStudents exchanges two students between hall and entrance
      Specified by:
      switchStudents in interface ExpertModel
      Parameters:
      hallS - - student moved from hall to entrance
      entranceS - - student moved from entrance to hall
      Throws:
      PlaceFullException - - if there is no space for the students of the selected color in the hall
      NoSuchStudentException - if there is no students of the selected color in the hall
      NoSuchStudentException - if there is no students of the selected color in the entrance

    • removeHall

      public void removeHall(ColorS s) throws NoSuchStudentException
      Method removeHall removes three students of the chosen color from the player's Hall and puts them in the bag. If any player has fewer than three students of that color, all the students of that color are put back in the bag
      Specified by:
      removeHall in interface ExpertModel
      Parameters:
      s - the Student being removed
      Throws:
      NoSuchStudentException - if there are no more students that can be removed from the hall

    • moveMN

      public void moveMN(int numMNSteps) throws InvalidMNStepsException
      method moveMN checks if the move is legal, then if there isn't noEntryTiles on the arrival Island it calculates the influence on that island and in necessary change the owner of the island and join the Island.
      Specified by:
      moveMN in interface ExpertModel
      Specified by:
      moveMN in interface Model
      Overrides:
      moveMN in class GameBoard
      Parameters:
      numMNSteps - int - number of steps that Mother Nature want to do.
      Throws:
      InvalidMNStepsException - - if Mother Nature can't make the indicated number of steps
